full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YAB RJE SA BDAG RGAN PO DKAR PO'I GSOL MCHOD DBYAR RNGA'I SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES YAB RJE SA BDAG RGAN PO DKAR PO'I GSOL MCHOD DBYAR RNGA'I SGRA DBYANGS 'DI NI SHES GNYEN BZANG PO RNAMS KYI BKAS BSKUL NAS SNGON GYI YIG RNYING DANG BSANG GSOL GZHAN RNAMS LAS KYANG BTUS TE BHAKshYA DHARMAS RANG GI 'DOD MOS LTAR BRIS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SVA STI TSUL 'DI DGE SLONG THABS MKHAS RGYA MTSO YIS, ,CHOS SDE BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING MCHOG TU, ,RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BZHENGS PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN BLA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,)
